name: Crystal Seal
description:
Join Roberto Estrada, our brave adventurer on this turn-based journey.
Meet his allies, his enemies, and the monsters that inhabit this dangerous land!

Enjoy engaging and challenging strategic battles that test you capabilities of tactical  thinking, there is always something new to react to!

---- State of the game -----

This version is intended as a early build, while most of the core mechanics have been implemented, balance and graphics may change during development. So currently the game has 3 full playable chapters, that can be beat in around 1 hour.
